name: Tarountula
flavorText: The ball of threads wrapped around its body is elastic enough to deflect the scythes of Scyther, this Pokémon’s natural enemy.

previous.name: Oinkologne
previous.flavorText: Oinkologne is proud of its fine, glossy skin. It emits a concentrated scent from the tip of its tail.

next.name: Spidops
next.flavorText: It clings to branches and ceilings using its threads and moves without a sound. It takes out its prey before the prey even notices it.
